title: Amazing this
body:
So a little background, in early 2018, i had to have discussions with Sera's about the fact that someone in league was using usernames that just flat out aren't acceptable, all of them just blatantly racist.

Turns out that player is still around, how do i know?

I saw him come online and got to behold his new name

[REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

Why is it that someone can literally have forced name changes for over a year, and the situation isn't looked into further then that at all?

EDIT- And that just shows how pathetic this is, edited out the pic of the name, no explanation as to how that can be a name type of over a year and a half. (The guy has gone from racist name to racist name because all that happens is a forced name change.)

replies.body: [REMOVED - REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS] = SWEEP UNDER THE RUG
